channel.title: Damn Crazy Lizards!
channel.description:
Hey guys, saw the most awesome thing the other day. Was out camping and saw a lizard that was about the size of a small adult.
It charged at this one guy, and he dropped to the floor and the lizard just ran over him and into the bushes.
Apparently these things will just run up and over you if you don't drop to the ground, and there claws are like razors. Damn crazy lizards
So, who has had awesome/weird animal experiences?

[/quote]LOL, and thats pretty crazy Drowner.

Yeh, because it actually happened.[/quote]
